General.Name: Coincheck Group N.V. Ordinary Shares
General.Description: Coincheck Group N.V. operates cryptocurrency exchanges in Japan. It operates Coincheck NFT Marketplace that enables non-fungible tokens to be traded between users or purchased by users from Coincheck. It trades in various cryptocurrencies, such as Bitcoin and Ethereum. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. Coincheck Group N.V. operates as a subsidiary of Monex Group, Inc.
